viralPosts.text:
Today I had to vote on a school bond to *bring local schools into compliance with the ADA." Read that again. 

I was 15 when the ADA passed and my old schools are STILL NOT ACCESSIBLE. I am 50 now, almost 51.

#CripTheVote
viralPosts.author: karriehiggins.bsky.social

viralPosts.text: Electronic machines that *also* produce a paper ballot are good, but using paper ballots only would make voting inaccessible to people who are blind/low vision. #CripTheVote
viralPosts.author: brassclothes.bsky.social

viralPosts.text:
Keep being loud, it works!!! 
#Disabilitysky #CripTheVote 

www.masslive.com/news/2025/09...

There's a blue and red theme.

viralPosts.text:
Harmonizer, an accessible color palette generator by Evil Martians. A Figma plugin and web app that use OKLCH with WCAG or APCA formulas to keep colors perceptually consistent across hues and themes. #design #a11y

harmonizer.evilmartians.com
